epicPulls.name: Merotter
epicPulls.description: One can find Merotters elegantly swimming through the waters of Venus. Under the midnight sky, their bodies glow in different colors.

epicPulls.name: Mamfoxy
epicPulls.description: Another name for Mamfoxy is a 'Walking Rainbow'. Elegant shades of rainbow flow through their translucent skin.

epicPulls.name: Drexul
epicPulls.description: Drexul's are nocturnal creatures. Bearing poisonous stingers for limbs and excellent night vision, they are efficient hunters.

epicPulls.name: Scythrel
epicPulls.description: Scythrel's can be found in misty environments. Despite only having two limbs, this creature moves silently and at explosive speed.

epicPulls.name: Xylogrith
epicPulls.description: This winged horror looms above the skies in search of prey. Their red wings hum with an eerie, bone-rattling vibration that will send shivers to any prey.
